channel.title: 🏢 DIAG, Sapienza University of Rome on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 DIAG, Sapienza University of Rome on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Unsupervised Hierarchy-Agnostic Segmentation: Parsing Semantic Image Structure
item.description: This study introduces a novel unsupervised hierarchy-agnostic image segmentation method achieving detailed and unbiased parsing of semantic image structures across various datasets.
